title: LF Duo or Silver/Gold team - Looking to Improve
body:
I am currently a Silver 4 player, only started ranked near the end of season 5. I'm looking for a team where we can all improve and develop our skill sets in a non-toxic environment. I believe in having a nice chill environment where by making a simple mistake you can reflect and improve as a team rather than receive the abundant flame of soloq. I know I'm definitely capable of reaching a higher elo than the one I'm currently at given the right dedication to learn as well as the time spent in ranked games. 

The new direction Rito has taken with the 'ranked dynamic queue' has been another big reason to invest some time into finding a team. I believe in Season 6 having a team in ranked solo q will probably be a vital tool for progression. 

My current mains are adc/mid - Although I'm always looking to expand on what positions I can effectively in the future given practice. 

With that all said please feel free add  - Even if your not looking for a team and simply like what you see. ;) 

Cheers all,

:) 

{{champion:26}}
